content:
Breaking news! Netizen contribution
Tonight in Zhoukou, Henan, a dispute arose due to fireworks. The police tried to take away the people who set off the fireworks. People surrounded the police car and demanded that they release the people. In the end, the police car was overturned.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizens added another perspective before the police car was overturned
The video shows that the people surrounded the police car and demanded to release the people. A policeman opened the door to try to prove that there was no one in the car, but at this time the emotions of the people at the scene were out of control, and someone shouted "Call the police car."
Then someone threw a drink at the police, and the crowd began to hit the police car. The police wanted to drive away, but was stopped by the crowd. Some people began to climb onto the police car, and the people around shouted "Release the people."

Zhoukou Luyi Education and Sports Bureau held an emergency meeting today
Emphasizing that ideological education will be carried out in a timely manner to educate students on gratitude, and at the same time, all units should avoid the problem of petitioning beyond the level.
And emphasized that teachers should try not to go out.
